My First Blog Post

You can write your blog posts here using simple text with markdown formatting. Here's what you can do: - **Bold text** with `**text**` - *Italic text* with `*text*` - Links with `[text](url)` - Lists like this one To add a new post, just create a new file in the `_posts` folder with the name format: `YYYY-MM-DD-title.md` Happy blogging!
